attributes.action: reverse its decision to allow only people aged 18 years old and over to become Police Community Support Officers (PCSO's), thereby allowing 16 and 17 year olds to join, which has been sucessful in several Forces already.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government has given in to pressure from the ignorant tabloid newspapers and banned anyone from becoming a Police Community Support Officer under the age of 18 years. Some forces, including the British Transport Police, West Midlands Police, and Thames Valley Police currently recruit 16 and 17 year old PCSO's as long as they can demonstrate they have the required skills to perform the job correctly.

This will now have to stop because of new Government rules. Serving 16 and 17 year old PCSO's are clearly doing a good job and liasing with anti social youths in a manner most older officers cannot. 

Please stop being ageist and remove the new rule. No one should be treated differently on the grounds of age AS LONG AS they can prove they are as capable as anybody else.
